Element.question: How long has the pain been occurring?
Has the pain been any of the following? Check all that apply:
What type of pain is the patient experiencing? Check all that apply or describe below:
Where is the pain located and does it travel?
Does the pain irradiate? Is it superficial or deep?
Is the patient experiencing any of the following symptoms?
What makes the pain worse?
Element.choices: Urination,Defecation,Menstrual Cycles,Eating or Drinking Alcohol,Changing of Position/Movement,Time of Day

Element.question: Does the patient's stool look the same or have a different color, smell or consistency?
Has the patient noticed any blood in stool?
How often does the patient defecate?
Element.choices: Less than once every two days,Once every two days,Once a day,Two times a day,More than two times a day

Element.question: Does the patient's urine look the same or have a different color or smell?
Has the patient noticed any difficulty urinating?
Has the patient noticed any burning while urinating?
Has the patient noticed any blood in urine?
How often does the patient urinate?
Element.choices: Less than once a day,Once a day,Twice a day,Three times a day,Four times a day,Five times a day,More than five times a day

Element.question: Does anything make the pain better?
Does anything make the pain worse?
Please enter any additional comments or information.
